verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
So freely,
Flows the endless love You give to me;
So freely,
Not dependent on my part.
As I am reaching out
Reveal the love within Your heart,
As I am reaching out
Reveal the love within Your heart.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Completely,
That's the way You give Your love to me;
Completely,
Not dependent on my part.
As I am reaching out
Reveal the love within Your heart,
As I am reaching out
Reveal the love within Your heart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So easy,
I receive the love You give to me;
So easy,
Not dependent on my part.
Flowing out to me
The love within Your heart,
Flowing out to me
The love within Your heart.
